title: Dungeons & Dragons Campaign Preparations with Jack & Marty
description:
The audience has been asking about potential Dungeons & Dragons streams for over a year now, so Jack and Marty are gonna sit down to talk some D&D, walk you through some map making (Foundry and Dungeondraft), and dungeon prep, and gather ideas from the community for a potential D&D series on The Escapist.

title: Subnautica: Below Zero Interview - What's New In The Sequel? | The Escapist Show +
description:
Nick Calandra sits down with Subnautica: Below Zero project lead, David Kalina to discuss what's new in the sequel, how the pandemic affected the studio and what's next for Unknown Worlds.
